title: Ayurvedic Immunity Syrup (Honey + Guduchi)
excerpt: A seasonal immunity-support syrup made with guduchi, amla, and raw honey to strengthen resilience throughout the year.
content:
## What Is This Ayurvedic Immunity Syrup?
A traditional syrup-based formulation designed to support immune resilience, especially during seasonal transitions. This blend uses guduchi extract, amla, and raw honey (or a jaggery-based vegan alternative).

## Ayurvedic Significance
Guduchi (Amrita) is one of Ayurveda’s top Rasayana herbs for immune modulation, resilience, and ojas-building. Amla strengthens digestive fire and supports antioxidant activity.

### Key Benefits
- Supports year-round immune strength.
- Gentle antioxidant and Rasayana effect.
- Helps maintain balance during weather changes.

## Ingredients
- Guduchi extract
- Amla pulp or extract
- Raw honey or jaggery-based vegan sweetener

## Usage Instructions
- Take 1 teaspoon daily during seasonal changes or per practitioner guidance.

## Packaging
- Amber bottle with dosing spoon for accurate measurement.

## Safety & Consultation
- Avoid raw honey for children under 1 year. Consult your doctor if pregnant, diabetic, or on medication.

## Why Choose This Syrup?
A balanced, classical approach to strengthening immunity using time-tested herbs and natural sweeteners.
